Name: Target Elimination Rifle
Rules: <u>Ammo 3</u>٫ <u>Gun</u>٫ <u>Equipment</u>\nAs long as ~ has ammo remaining the attached asset has <u>Sniper</u> (It can attack from the backline).\nEach turn you may utilize the attached asset to add a charge to ~. If the attached asset would deal damage to an asset with generalized cost less than ~'s charge instead remove all charges from ~ and remove that asset from the game.

Name: Skynet Assassin
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Target Elimination Rifle`</u> (~@ enters with a `Target Elimination Rifle` attached.)٫ <u>Armed -- `Skynet Silenced Pistol`</u>٫ <u>Freerunner</u> (Whenever ~ would take damage during combat٫ you may instead remove it from combat. If you do remove this effect.)

Name: Skynet Central Control
Rules: (Becomes `Skynet is Watching` if you already control ~.)\nAs Commander -- Combatants you control have Firewall Forfeit a Generator (They can't be chosen unless the choosing player Forfeits a Generator).\nAs Asset -- Whenever a card you control is chosen by an opponent you may create a `Target Elimination Rifle` on the battlefield. If ~ is Embodied (Inside a vehicle.) instead create a `Skynet Assassin`.

Name: Skynet is Watching
Rules: Tell an opponent what to choose next. \nIf the next time they choose something they choose it you both draw a card٫ otherwise <u>Hack that card or effect</u> (Send that card or effect on the stack to its owner's discard pile٫ none of its effects occur.).\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Skynet Central Control` back into your deck.)

Name: Skynet Silenced Pistol
Rules: <u>Ammo 5</u>٫ <u>Gun</u> (As long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset is ranged.)٫ <u>Tradeable</u> (Once each turn while reorganizing units٫ you may pay ~'s cost٫ if you do choose another asset to attach ~ to.)٫ <u>Equipment</u> (When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may choose an asset to attach it to.)\nAs long as ~ has ammo remaining the attached asset has <u>Stealth</u> (The chosen asset can't be intercepted.).

Name: Skynet Surveillance Camera
Rules: <u>Vehicle for Skynet Central Control</u> (~ counts as a Vehicle but only for Skynet Central Control.)\nA deck may have any number of ~ in it. \nIf ~ has an AI inside of it٫ whenever a card you control is chosen by an opponent you may draw a card.

Name: "You Always Hide Behind a Little Girl"

Name: Skynet Trainee
Rules: <u>Freerunner</u> (Whenever ~ would take damage during combat٫ you may instead remove it from combat. If you do remove this effect.)٫ <u>Quick Hire</u> (When ~@ is hired as a generator٫ it can be utilized as soon as it is hired.)\n~ counts as if it didn't have any effects.

Name: Shaomao٫ Skynet Trainee

If you do remove this effect.)\n~ counts as if she didn't have any effects.

When ~ enters the battlefield search your deck for a Shaomao card٫ shuffle٫ and put her on top.

Name: "I'm Keeping China Safe"

Name: Skynet Tracker
Rules: <u>Equipment</u> (When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may choose an asset to attach it to.)\nAt the beginning of your turn٫ if you don't control the attached asset٫ gain control of it. \nWhenever you choose the attached asset with a non-copied effect٫ copy that effect for all other assets with ~ attached.

Rules: (Becomes `"I'll Give you a One Day Head Start"` if you already control ~)\n<u>Armed -- `Skynet Tracker`</u> (~@ enters with a `Skynet Tracker` attached.)\nWhenever ~ attacks create a Skynet Assassin blocking him.

Name: "I'll Give you a One Day Head Start"

Name: "Chan has Failed to Meet Expectations٫ Eliminate Him."

Name: "If you Help Me Make Her Go AWOL٫ They'll Send More After Her"
Rules: <u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made.)\n-> <u>Kill a Henchman to Prove Your Legit -- [N][N][N][N][+]</u> Choose an asset with <u>Generalized Cost</u> [4] or less to kill. \n-> <u>Spoof His Tracker -- [1][+]</u> Create a `Shaomao٫ Captured Hunter` in your hand.

Name: Shaomao٫ Captured Hunter
Rules:
(Becomes `Chan Fled into a Building` if you already control ~.)
<u>Bleeding</u> (At the end of your turn ~ permanently loses 1 health.)
When ~ enters the battlefield each opponent <u>Forfeits</u> any Shaomao assets they control.
~ can't attack.

-> <u>Scan for Heat Signatures -- [O][+]</u> Flip all face down cards٫ face up.
-> <u>Shoot Him -- [1][+]</u> Create a `Bullet` on the battlefield.

<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Shaomao٫ Captured Hunter` back into your deck.)

Name: "They Know How to Smuggle Things"
Rules: Choose an asset you control to give to an opponent.

Name: Flashbang
Rules: When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may attach it to a combatant.\n<u>Throw</u> (Activate this ability only if attached to a combatant.)٫ <u>Forfeit</u> (Put the specified card into its owner's discard.) ~: Choose a combatant; the chosen combatant and adjacent combatants become utilized and gain <u>Stun</u>.\n<u>Forfeit</u> ~: Add [O][O][O].

Name: "It Would be Funny if We Gave the Legless Girl to Hana"

(Becomes `Handstand Fighting Style` if you already control ~.)

Shuffle an `Incarceration` into your deck.
